question.questionText: Joanne mixed material R and material D together, added water, and stirred. After a few minutes, the liquid was clear and there was a solid on the bottom of the cup. Joanne used a paper filter to separate the solid from the liquid. Why does the solid stay in the filter when the liquid goes through?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The particles of the solid are too big to go through the holes in the paper filter.
